items.item_details: Prior to adjourning to closed session, the Board President will call the meeting to order.  Members of the public who wish to address the Board of Trustees concerning closed session items only may complete a request form prior to the start of the meeting.  Comments are limited to five minutes per person.
items.item_text: Call to Order / Public Comment on Closed Session Items Only
items.item_text_raw: Call to Order / Public Comment on Closed Session Items Only

meeting_sections.section_name: CALL TO ORDER - Hinson Campus Center, Don Bautista Room (2:30 p.m.)

items.item_text: PUBLIC EMPLOYEE APPOINTMENT - Chancellor (Pursuant to California Government Code Section 54957)
